author: Allyson Chiu
title: Young people attended a ‘coronavirus party’ in Kentucky, governor says. At least one reveler is now infected. - The Washington Post
description: Young people attended a ‘coronavirus party’ in Kentucky, governor says. At least one reveler is now infected. The Washington Post A group of young adults held a coronavirus party in Kentucky to defy orders to socially distance. Now one of them has coronavirus…
content:
Dont: Host or attend a coronavirus party.
Amid an ongoing global pandemic, Beshears dont may seem like an obvious instruction. But on Tuesday, the governor found himself having to explicitly tell people to stop taking part in such events after one reveler te… [+3909 chars]
